import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; import Tilt from "react-parallax-tilt"; import "./About.css"; import myImg from "../../assets/DP.png" import Hi from "../../assets/Hi.gif" import GitHubImg from "../../assets/images/socials/github.png" import LinkedinImg from "../../assets/images/socials/linkedin.png" import MediumImg from "../../assets/images/socials/devpost1.png" import InstaImg from "../../assets/images/socials/instagram.png" import Type from "./Type"; function About() { return (

Hi , I'm Servando Negrete

servandongti@ubuntu: ~

servandongti@ubuntu: ~ $ about.txt
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

I am a Full Stack Developer and Machine Learning enthusiast.
servandongti@ubuntu: ~ $
CV - EN
CV - ES


); } export default About;
